Blog Roadmap

Jan 25, 2018

Version 0

  • Jekyll backbone & templates
    • Note post
    • Progress post
    • Pixel Dailies post
    • Socials
  • Front page
    • Note Section (post loop)
    • Gallery (although might be too convoluted)
      • Navigation (dynamic)
      • Progress bar (dynamic)
      • Thumbnails with meta

    • About (hidden)
  • Responsive
    • Desktop
    • Tablets
    • Mobile

  • No more single page

  • Comments & Share
